𝗧𝗫𝗧𝗡𝗘𝗧-𝗕𝗥𝗢𝗪𝗦𝗘𝗥 | Browsing the web over SMS when no WiFi or mobile data is available.  🔥 Super Hot!

❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗖𝗞: ☕ Java 
🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Browsing the web over SMS when no WiFi or mobile data is available.
📅 Created: Mar 2022 • Updated: Apr 2025

❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂

✨ 𝗞𝗘𝗬 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 ✨

✅ Browse the web over SMS
✅ No WiFi or mobile data required
✅ Uses Brotli compression
✅ Custom Base-114 encoding
✅ Removes media content, JavaScript, and CSS
✅ Includes TxtNet Server for hosting your own server


❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂

📊 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗧𝗦

⭐⭐⭐⭐ 1.2K 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘀
🍴 29 𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗸𝘀
🔍 8 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗶𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲𝘀

❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

TxtNet Browser is an Android app that enables web browsing via SMS, eliminating the need for WiFi or mobile data. It achieves this by compressing HTML responses using Brotli and encoding them with a custom Base-114 format. The app also includes TxtNet Server, allowing users to host their own SMS-based web browsing service.

❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂

🔗 𝗟𝗜𝗡𝗞𝗦
• 𝗚𝗶𝘁𝗛𝘂𝗯: https://github.com/lukeaschenbrenner/TxtNet-Browser

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

SpacetimeDB is a relational database designed for building multiplayer applications. It focuses on providing real-time data synchronization and supports features like smart contracts, making it suitable for game development and other collaborative applications. The core concept is to enable multiplayer experiences with minimal latency.

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

This repository hosts materials for an open Machine Learning course, including lecture recordings, slides, and homework assignments. It covers a range of topics from introductory concepts like Naive Bayes and kNN to more advanced topics like Deep Learning and Gradient Boosting. The course provides a structured learning path with deadlines for assignments.

𝗚𝗢𝗗𝗢𝗫𝗬 | Simplifying reverse proxy setup and management for Dockerized applications, including automatic SSL certificate management, access control, and traffic management features.  🔥 Super Hot!

▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗖𝗞: 🐹 Go 
🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Simplifying reverse proxy setup and management for Dockerized applications, including automatic SSL certificate management, access control, and traffic management features.
📅 Created: Feb 2024 • Updated: Apr 2025

▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪

✨ 𝗞𝗘𝗬 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 ✨

✅ Reverse proxy
✅ Docker integration
✅ WebUI
✅ Automatic SSL certificate management (Let's Encrypt)
✅ ACL (IP/CIDR, Country, Timezone)
✅ Idle-sleep for Docker containers and Proxmox LXCs
✅ OpenID Connect support
✅ HTTP middlewares
✅ Custom error pages


▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪

📊 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗧𝗦

⭐⭐⭐⭐ 1.7K 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘀
🍴 68 𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗸𝘀
🔍 11 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗶𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲𝘀

▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

GoDoxy is a lightweight and performant reverse proxy designed for easy integration with Docker. It offers features like automatic SSL certificate management with Let's Encrypt, connection-level access control, and an intuitive WebUI for configuration and monitoring. GoDoxy simplifies the process of exposing and securing microservices.

▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪

𝗧𝗖𝗣𝗜𝗡𝗚 | Monitor network latency and connection quality using TCP, especially in environments where ICMP is blocked.  🔥 Super Hot!

◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗖𝗞: 🐹 Go 
🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Monitor network latency and connection quality using TCP, especially in environments where ICMP is blocked.
📅 Created: Feb 2021 • Updated: Apr 2025

◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇

✨ 𝗞𝗘𝗬 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 ✨

✅ TCP ping instead of ICMP when ICMP is blocked
✅ Colored, plain, JSON, CSV, and sqlite3 output formats
✅ Network latency, packet loss, and connection quality monitoring
✅ Source interface, timeout, and interval specification
✅ IPv4 and IPv6 support
✅ Real-time connection statistics
✅ Downtime and uptime reporting
✅ Retries hostname resolution
✅ Different TCP sequence numbering for successful and unsuccessful probes


◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇

📊 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗧𝗦

⭐⭐⭐ 849 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘀
🍴 75 𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗸𝘀
🔍 11 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗶𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲𝘀

◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

TCPING is a cross-platform ping utility that uses TCP instead of ICMP, making it suitable for environments where ICMP is blocked. It offers various output formats like JSON and CSV, and allows users to monitor network latency, packet loss, and connection quality. It supports IPv4/IPv6, and provides real-time connection statistics.

◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇

ezBookkeeping is a lightweight, self-hosted personal finance application designed for ease of use on both desktop and mobile devices. It offers features such as multi-database support, Docker deployment, two-factor authentication, and data import/export, making it a versatile solution for managing personal finances.

𝗡𝗪𝗜𝗡𝗙𝗢 | Obtaining system and hardware information on Windows systems.  🔥 Super Hot!

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗖𝗞: 💻 C 
🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Obtaining system and hardware information on Windows systems.
📅 Created: Nov 2021 • Updated: Apr 2025

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

✨ 𝗞𝗘𝗬 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 ✨

✅ Obtains detailed system and hardware information (SMBIOS, CPUID, S.M.A.R.T., PCI, EDID)
✅ Supports exporting data in JSON, YAML, and LUA formats
✅ Gathers information directly without relying on WMI
✅ Compatible with Windows XP


━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

📊 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗧𝗦

⭐⭐⭐ 286 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘀
🍴 26 𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗸𝘀
🔍 3 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗶𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲𝘀

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

NWinfo is a Win32 program designed to retrieve comprehensive system and hardware details. It gathers information directly, bypassing WMI, and supports various export formats like JSON, YAML, and LUA. The tool is compatible with older Windows versions, including Windows XP.

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

🔗 𝗟𝗜𝗡𝗞𝗦
• 𝗚𝗶𝘁𝗛𝘂𝗯: https://github.com/a1ive/nwinfo

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

Capacitor enables developers to build cross-platform applications for iOS, Android, and the web from a single codebase. It provides a unified API for accessing native features and supports the creation of native plugins. Capacitor also offers first-class PWA support, allowing applications to be deployed to both app stores and the mobile web.
